alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:33AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, southeastern Carlton, southwestern Lake, west central Bayfield and northern Douglas Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 531 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Brimson, to near Superior, to near Nemadji, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Highland Lake, Thomas Lake Near Brimson and Wisconsin Point around 540 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Castle Danger, Hawthorne, Beaver Bay, Split Rock Lighthouse and South Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
